about.content: Alatar Logistics Group Ltd is a professional logistics company dedicated to providing comprehensive transport, haulage, and warehousing solutions. With our expertise and commitment to excellence, we ensure your goods reach their destination safely and on time.

common.title: Our Services
common.subtitle: Professional logistics solutions tailored to your needs

transportHaulage.title: Transport & Haulage
transportHaulage.subtitle: Reliable and efficient transport solutions across the UK
transportHaulage.description: Our transport and haulage services offer simple and efficient solutions for businesses of all sizes. From pallet transport to container deliveries, we ensure your goods reach their destination safely and on time. With our modern fleet and experienced drivers, we provide professional logistics services that meet the highest industry standards.

feature1.title: Pallet Transport
feature1.description: Efficient transportation of palletised goods with flexible delivery options and full tracking capabilities.

feature2.title: Container Transport
feature2.description: Seamless collection and delivery of containers from ports to destinations across the UK.

feature3.title: Port Collections
feature3.description: Prompt collection services from all major UK ports, with customs handling expertise.

feature4.title: Groupage Services
feature4.description: Cost-effective consolidation of smaller shipments for efficient transportation.

freightForwarding.title: Freight Forwarding
freightForwarding.subtitle: Expert international shipping and customs handling
freightForwarding.description: Our freight forwarding services provide seamless international transport solutions with expert customs handling. We manage all aspects of the import/export process, from documentation to final delivery. With our extensive network of partners, we ensure efficient movement of your goods across borders while complying with all regulatory requirements.

feature1.title: Customs Handling
feature1.description: Expert navigation of customs procedures and documentation for smooth border crossings.

feature2.title: International Shipping
feature2.description: Comprehensive freight solutions for global markets with reliable partner networks.

feature3.title: Documentation Management
feature3.description: Precise handling of all required shipping documents for international transport.

feature4.title: Consolidation Services
feature4.description: Optimised cargo consolidation to reduce costs and improve efficiency.

specialisedHaulage.title: Specialised Haulage
specialisedHaulage.subtitle: Solutions for oversized and heavy loads
specialisedHaulage.description: Our specialised haulage services cater to unique transport requirements, including heavy haulage and oversized loads. We have the expertise and equipment to handle challenging cargo that requires special attention. Our team ensures all regulatory requirements are met, providing safe and efficient transport for even the most complex loads.

feature1.title: Heavy Haulage
feature1.description: Safe transportation of heavy machinery and equipment with specialised vehicles.

feature2.title: Oversized Loads
feature2.description: Expert handling of wide, long, or high loads with necessary permits and escort services.

feature3.title: Retail Logistics
feature3.description: Tailored distribution services for retail businesses, including time-sensitive deliveries.

feature4.title: Project Cargo
feature4.description: End-to-end management of complex logistics projects requiring special handling.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.subtitle: Secure storage and distribution facilities
warehousing.description: Our warehousing operations provide secure, flexible storage solutions with comprehensive inventory management. We offer both short and long-term storage options in our modern facilities, equipped with the latest security and handling systems. Our warehousing services include storage, picking, packing, and distribution, providing a complete solution for your supply chain needs.

feature1.title: Storage and Handling
feature1.description: Secure facilities with flexible storage options and professional handling services.

feature2.title: Inventory Management
feature2.description: Advanced tracking systems providing real-time visibility of your inventory.

feature3.title: Pick and Pack Services
feature3.description: Efficient order fulfilment with careful preparation and packaging.

feature4.title: Distribution
feature4.description: Seamless integration with our transport services for end-to-end logistics solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Logistics Partner in the UK

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Alatar Logistics Group Ltd, our mission is to provide reliable, efficient, and cost-effective logistics solutions that help our clients succeed. We are committed to delivering exceptional service with integrity and professionalism.

value1.title: Reliability
value1.description: We deliver on our promises, ensuring your goods arrive safely and on time, every time.

value2.title: Excellence
value2.description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do, from customer service to operational efficiency.

value3.title: Innovation
value3.description: We continuously seek new ways to improve our services and provide better solutions for our clients.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to exceptional service

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our logistics experts

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Use govern your use of the services provided by Alatar Logistics Group Ltd, registered in England under company number 13982779. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: In these Terms of Use, 'we', 'our', and 'us' refer to Alatar Logistics Group Ltd. 'You' and 'your' refer to the customer or user of our services. 'Services' refers to any transport, haulage, freight forwarding, warehousing, or other logistics services provided by us.

serviceUsage.title: Service Usage
serviceUsage.content: Our services are provided subject to these Terms of Use and any additional terms specific to the service requested. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service without notice.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: You are responsible for providing accurate information regarding goods to be transported or stored. You must ensure that goods are properly packaged and comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Alatar Logistics Group Ltd and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: We are liable for loss or damage to goods in accordance with applicable transport and warehousing regulations. Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law and as specified in our service contracts.

termsChanges.title: Changes to Terms
termsChanges.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting to our website. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.
